title: Crunchyroll Winter 2023 Simulcast Slate Offers Largest Line-Up Yet
description: The Crunchyroll Winter Simulcast 2023 slate is the biggest anime line-up yet, with TRIGUN STAMPEDE, VINLAND SAGA Season 2, and more!

title: Superman & Lois, James Gunn/DCU, Sandman & More: BCTV Daily Dispatch

title: Did Tracker Just Reveal Who Killed Colter’s Dad? Series Boss Says ‘There’s Much More to That Story to Unpack’ as He Lays Out Season 3 Plans
description: In the Tracker Season 2 finale, Colter Shaw confronts Otto Waldron (played by SEAL Team’s Alex Fernandez), the mysterious lineman who was in the woods the night Ashton Shaw died more than 20 years ago. He holds Otto at gunpoint, and assumes that he’s locking eyes with the man who killed his father — but […]
author: Ryan Schwartz

title: 1923 Alum Helen Mirren Compares Cara to MobLand’s Maeve: ‘Two Sides of a Coin, You Know?’ Plus: Her Take on That Harrigan Death
description: This post contains spoilers from Sunday’s episode of MobLand. Proceed accordingly. This is probably not the Mother’s Day that Maeve Harrigan envisioned. In the latest MobLand, which happened to debut on Mother’s Day in the United States, Maeve was forced to watch one of her children die. Son Brendan was murdered with a chainsaw on […]
author: Kimberly Roots

title: Tracker Season 2 Finale Finally Gives Colter Answers, But At A Cost
description: Colter travels home to Echo Ridge to look for a missing diner owner and encounters more than he bargained for during Tracker Season 2 Episode 20. The post Tracker Season 2 Finale Finally Gives Colter Answers, But At A Cost appeared first on TV Fanatic.
author: Whitney Evans

title: Characters of the Week: Wild Cards & Leverage: Redemption Tap into Vulnerability in Stellar Episodes
description: Our Characters of the Week include vulnerability from Wild Cards, Leverage: Redemption, and 9-1-1's finest. Find out who made the list here! The post Characters of the Week: Wild Cards & Leverage: Redemption Tap into Vulnerability in Stellar Episodes appeared first on TV Fanatic.
